content.p: Our economics courses combine all the core analytical and quantitative techniques required by modern economics graduates. We're committed to presenting you with a wide range of specialist and applied options across all areas of the discipline. Our academics are experts in their respective fields and have considerable research and policy experience, meaning the modules you study will be informed by cutting-edge economic thinking. We offer the following undergraduate degree programmes: On our BSc Economics, you'll study macroeconomics, microeconomics, mathematics and statistics and will gain all the core analytical and quantitative techniques required by economics graduates. On our BSc Economics and Econometrics, youâ€™ll learn how to use statistical and mathematical models to test economic theories through the practical application of real-world data analysis. On this course, you'll study microeconomics and macroeconomics, political theory and global politics, as well as core aspects of philosophy including reasoning, logic and ethics. Explore our campuses, accommodation and student life online. You can also discover campus life with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Visit our open days hub We offer pre-sessional English language courses to improve your language level to meet the entry requirements for your degree. There is continued support while you study with us, with courses, consultations and drop-ins available. English language support Sir Clive Granger Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
